data.text: An ancient and medieval engine of warfare, usually having a design similar to a crossbow, used to hurl heavy projectiles.

data.text: An ancient military engine used for throwing missiles.
[NL.] In anatomy, the astragalus, a bone of the tarsus.
An ancient military engine, in the form of a crossbow, used for hurling large missiles.
